text: Hans Ziegler may refer to: *Hans K. Ziegler (1911–1999), solar cell/satellite engineer *Hans Severus Ziegler (1893–1978), Nazi official *Hans Ziegler (physicist) (1910–1985), Swiss physicist *Hans Ziegler (actor) (1879–1961), German-born Austrian stage director and stage actor *Hans Ziegler (politician) (1887–1957), mayor of Nuremberg
title: Hans Ziegler
